page.title: 13Horse riding, Murroes
page.content:
In this area there are{horse lessons } every weekend.Many people come from all over, from Fife,Dundee,Broughty Ferry or Monifieth.The people who own all the horses are called the McKays and they have 29 horses.The McKays also have some horses down at Camperdown and they are busy there too.TheMcKays buy lots of new horses and about 150 people go there on Saturday or Sunday.These are some of the horses.Sooty,Annie,Queenie and Goldie.
They also have lots of donkeys. About twice a year they have a{donkey} derby.My dad makes up a silly schedule with lots of funny pictures. The riding lessons cost Â£2 and you get jumping or trekking. You don't get to choose, but I enjoy it.
